body:
Is anyone can access the ftp address below?

https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/bc145b2b3f87da8276e4c2e0665e9830de3d0322/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/alsa-lib/package.py#L15

When I use spack to install alsa-lib, it failed, the reason is the ftp address is unavailable. Is this a bug or just for some network problems that only some area could not access the ftp?
title: install alsa-lib failed
